properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 8:34AM CST until January 20 at 10:17AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At
Gainesville Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

.Flooding continues along the Tombigbee River following recent
heavy rainfall...and a flood warning remains in effect along the
river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Monday morning... The Flood Warning continues for The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * until Monday morning...or until the warning is cancelled. * At 8:15 AM Thursday the stage was 109.3 feet. * Flood stage is 101 feet. * Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast. * Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 109.4 feet by this afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage Sunday night. * Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands
